function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Assumptions made regarding z ur value for upper-room uvgi analysis based on published mean z values for aerosolised coronaviruses","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty associated with assumed z ur value and introduction of worst-case scenario","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Direct inverse relationship between z ur, particle residence time, and required irradiation flux","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variability in uv irradiation experiment methodologies and results.","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in inactivating sars-cov-1 and mers-cov compared to influenza a","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Substrate or medium influencing the magnitude of the z value achieved for inactivating microbes","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and Treatment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low penetration depth of uv light through concentrated suspensions","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and Treatment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Modeling expected and worst-case scenarios for upper-room uvgi installations","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on surrogate z ur values for sars-cov-2","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on room air mixing for effective uvgi air disinfection","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 due to poor ventilation and air movement","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential exposure to uvgi if not properly installed or maintained.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of sars-cov-2 through contact with contaminated surfaces","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effectiveness of the anti-sars-cov-2 coatings","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unknown chemical groups to inactivate sars-cov-2","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contaminated equipment and tools as sources of transmission","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Testing for sars-cov-2 inactivation","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to chemicals such as nitric acid and pure gopts","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of exposure to cu2o particles during film fabrication and testing","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of biological testing with sars-cov-2","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Handling of infectious materials","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Swift and dramatic inactivation of sars-cov-2 by the cu 2 o/pu coating, reducing the viral titer by 99.9% in 1 hour.","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variations in sample preparation and testing leading to differences in the effectiveness of the coating.","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for incomplete inactivation of the virus due to variability in wettability of the cu 2 o/pu film","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertain virucidal activity against specific viruses, such as sars-cov-2","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to sars-cov-2 virus during testing of the cu 2 o/pu film","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inactivation of sars-cov-2 virus on the coated surface","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential release of sars-cov-2 virus from uncoated samples in the built environment","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential failure of other coating technologies amine and ammonium-based polymers to inactivate the virus","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of mechanical damage to the coating leading to loss of virus-inactivating properties","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Residential crowding and increased contact driving the spread of infectious respiratory illnesses","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overcrowding increasing the spread of respiratory infectious diseases in homeless shelters and public facilities","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased risk of covid-19 transmission in transient housing","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Weakened immune system due to stress from eviction threat","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Eviction leading to lower access to covid-19 testing and medical attention","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased access to primary and specialty medical care due to eviction","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Health risks associated with eviction","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased covid-19 transmission due to lifting eviction moratoria","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Excess infections due to backlog of cases and economic duress","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of health care access and medical debt","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of housing stability increases the risk of covid-19 infection, transmission, illness, and death","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Respondents aged 19 to 70 years were included in the survey, potentially encompassing different susceptibility to contagious diseases.","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Social isolation leading to risks of anxiety, depression, and premature mortality","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proper sanitation in urban agriculture spaces leading to contamination and spread of foodborne illnesses","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient ventilation and air quality in multi-family residential buildings with green spaces leading to airborne disease transmission","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of remote work environment safety measures in multi-purpose urban gardens","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased density and social interaction leading to higher risk of disease transmission in the residential area","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Emphasized flexibility and adaptability of apartment units may lead to frequent rearrangements and changes, increasing the risk of spreading contagious diseases.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Formation of a large number of terraces and gardens increases the potential for social gatherings and close interactions, leading to a higher risk of contagion.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shared common spaces for socialization may become hotspots for disease transmission if not properly managed and maintained.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"}]}
